summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 DODGE RAM 2500. THE CONTACT STATED IN DECEMBER 2013, SHE RECEIVED RECALL NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 13V529000 (STEERING). THE CONTACT STATED SHE ATTEMPTED TO HAVE THE VEHICLE SERVICED ON NUMEROUS OCCASIONS, BUT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCE THE FAILURE.  THE VIN AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE NOT AVAILABLE.  UPDATED 05/12/2014*LJ  *TR
